introduction: It is based on the plots of Shakespeare's tragedies "Othello", "Hamlet", and "Romeo and Juliet". Used symphonic overtures by PI Tchaiko vsky "Hamlet" and "Romeo and Juliet" and music by G. Purcell."Pavana Mavra" is a pearl of modern dance, a dance composition of amazing beauty and Shakespearean intensity of passions. The brilliant choreography of Jose Limon with the extremely abstract language of dance bewitches, hypnotizes, leads into the world of desires, passions, pain, despair, anger, madness of the heroes ..."Hamlet" is a bold attempt by means of choreography to tell about the eternal - honor, duty, happiness and the meaning of existence ... And again for the choreographer and dancers the plot is just the canvas of the ballet. And only music, plasticity, movements are extremely specific in the expression of feelings and thoughts ...Romeo and Juliet - Verona, Italy. At a ball in the Capulet's palace, the love of two young creatures, doomed to hatred by fate, is born. But their love is stronger than tribal enmity, stronger than prejudices and insurmountable obstacles.
